original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1266)@</color>  以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(501)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成法術傷害，並在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(116)@</color> 秒內造成降低 <color=#ccffcc>3</color> 點移動速度以及攻擊間隔，且每秒造成 <color=#ccffcc>5</color> 點傷害的冰凍狀態。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1266)@</color> in <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(501)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> inflicts spell damage on the enemy in front of you, and reduces it in <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(116)@</color> within seconds <color=#ccffcc>3</color> A frozen state with moving speed and attack interval, and causing <color=#ccffcc>5</color> damage every second.
